snippet: The Obama administration said it would seek to build deeper relationships with African leaders, though some advocates worry that human-rights issues will take a back seat.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; landmark gathering of nearly 50 African leaders will take place in Washington and centerpiece of four-day meeting with Obama administration will be conference to stimulate trade and investment; with such a heavy emphasis on commerce, some activists say chance to press African leaders on human rights abuses could be missed.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said it would seek to build deeper relationships with African leaders, though some advocates worry that human-rights issues will take a back seat.

headline.main: African Leaders Coming to Talk Business May Also Be Pressed on Rights
headline.print_headline: African Leaders Coming to Talk Business May Also Be Pressed on Rights

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
